name: Dire Storage
description:
The existential dread is near. Fill in those shelves until you run out of storage! 

Btw time is money (so is the correct box pattern). 

Controls

  • RMB to suck in boxes
  • LMB to eject
  • WASD to move

Made by District Zero Studios Team for Epic Mega Jam 2021

  • Game Design - Asya Orlova
  • Programming - Sergey Antsukevich, Sergey Rokhmanyuk
  • Sound - Sergey Rokhmanyuk
  • Lighting and VFX - Ivan Guschin
  • Logo Design - Artem Petrov

Assets - Polygon Gang Warfare Pack by Synty Studios

Music - Dire Straits, Money for nothing (ringtone remix version)
